components.name: HorizontalCardList
components.description: A horizontal scrolling card list component for displaying items with images.

props.name: title
props.description: Header text displayed above the list

itemShape.id: required - Unique identifier for the item
itemShape.imageUrl: optional - URL for the item's image

props.name: onItemClick
props.description: Callback when an item is clicked, receives the item as argument

components.example: <HorizontalCardList title="Books" items={data.books.map(b => ({ id: b.id, imageUrl: b.cover, firstLineText: b.title, secondLineText: b.author }))} />

components.name: VerticalCardList
components.description: A vertical card list component for displaying items with images in a column layout.

props.name: title
props.description: Header text displayed above the list

itemShape.id: required - Unique identifier for the item
itemShape.imageUrl: optional - URL for the item's image

props.name: onItemClick
props.description: Callback when an item is clicked, receives the item as argument

components.example: <VerticalCardList title="Books" items={data.books.map(b => ({ id: b.id, imageUrl: b.cover, firstLineText: b.title, secondLineText: b.author, thirdLineText: b.year }))} />

components.name: DetailPage
components.description: A detail view component with image, headers, description, and key-value details section.

props.name: imageUrl
props.description: URL for the item's main image

props.name: detail_section_header
props.description: Header for the details section (defaults to 'Details')

props.name: details
props.description: Array of detail objects { label, value }

components.example: <DetailPage data={{ title: 'The Great Gatsby', sub_title: 'Classic Literature', description: 'A story of wealth and obsession...', detail_section_header: 'Book Info', details: [{ label: 'Author', value: 'F. Scott Fitzgerald' }, { label: 'Published', value: '1925' }] }} />
